[templates.add generate] //** Create ticket **// [session_ticket.create nonce=yes set=template.ticket/] //** Create collection (module.collection.post_type ki value) array **//
[if.not_empty template.submit_to] [arr.create set="template.collection_array"] [post_type][template.get collection_type /][/post_type] [/arr.create] //** Set activity against the ticket **// [session_ticket.set_activity {template.ticket} collection={template.collection_array} module='{template.submit_to}' /] [/if.not_empty]
[if.empty template.submit_to] [arr.create set="template.collection_array"] [post_type][module.collection.post_type /][/post_type] [/arr.create] //** Set activity against the ticket **// [session_ticket.set_activity {template.ticket} collection={template.collection_array} module='auto-save' /] [/if.empty]
[session_ticket.set {template.token} field="form_config_service" value="{template.form_config_service}" /] [session_ticket.set {template.token} field="callback_service" value="{template.callback_service}" /] [loop.@eachExtra template.extra_params] [session_ticket.set {template.token} field="{@eachExtra.key}" value="{@eachExtra.item}" /] [/loop.@eachExtra]
[template.return template.ticket/] [/templates.add]

    [loop.@tab @gr.item.tabs]
  • [aw2.get @tab.item.label /]
    • [/loop.@tab]
[/if.greater_than_zero] [if.greater_than_zero @gr.item.tabs.count]
[loop.@tab @gr.item.tabs]
//**[aw2.get @tab.item.class /]**//
[loop.@field @tab.item.field] [templates.run run_field /] [/loop.@field]
[/loop.@tab]
[/if.greater_than_zero] //** TABs: END **//
[/templates.add] [templates.add run_field] [template.set value="{@field.item.value}" /] //** env.set postdata="query_result" in Settings App > Module Home **// [if.empty template.value] [env.get postdata.meta.{@field.key} set="template.value" /] [/if.empty] [if.empty template.value] [env.get meta_data.{@field.key} set="template.value" /] [/if.empty] [template.set service_name="form_control.{@field.item.type}" /] //** Default **// [if.not_empty @field.item.form_control_service] [template.set service_name="{@field.item.form_control_service}.{@field.item.type}" /] [/if.not_empty] [if.else not_empty="{module.default_form_control_service}"] [template.set service_name="{module.default_form_control_service}.{@field.item.type}" /] [/if.else] //** TODO: attributes should be dynamic, so not need to edit this when new attribute introduced **// [service.run {template.service_name} id={@field.key} label="{@field.item.label}" parent_class="{@field.item.parent_class}" in_class="{@field.item.in_class}" class="{@field.item.class}" placeholder="{@field.item.placeholder}" value="{template.value}" selected="{@field.item.selected}" taxonomy="{@field.item.taxonomy}" term='{@field.item.term}' options="{@field.item.options}" options_array="{@field.item.options}" user-role="{@field.item.user-role}" posttype="{@field.item.post_type}" args="{@field.item.args}" tooltip="{@field.item.tooltip}" upload_label="{@field.item.upload_label}" multiple="{@field.item.multiple}" required="{@field.item.required}" checked="{@field.item.checked}" readonly="{@field.item.readonly}" meta_type="{@field.item.meta_type}" /] [/templates.add]

module.form-config.col] [module.set form_meta="" /] [loop.@eachKey @eachAllowedFields.item.fields.comma] [aw2.get @eachKey.item set="template.column" /] [aw2.get request.{template.column} set="template.value" /] [module.set_array form_meta.new meta_key="{template.column}" meta_value="{template.value}" coll_type="{@eachAllowedFields.item.coll_type default=info}" /] [/loop.@eachKey] /] [/loop.@eachAllowedFields] [/if.not_empty] [/templates.add] [templates.add send_to_db] [template.set object_id="FORM{unique_number}" empty="{template.object_id}" /] [templates.run default_metas /] coll_type='{template.coll_type}' /] [module.set_array default_meta.new meta_key="created_date" meta_value="{template.date}" coll_type='{template.coll_type}' /] [module.set_array default_meta.new meta_key="created_datetime" meta_value="{template.dttime}" coll_type='{template.coll_type}' /] [module.set_array default_meta.new meta_key="created_timeseconds" meta_value="{template.timeseconds}" item.title: validate-form
item.dc:creator: praveen
item.content:encoded:
//** @param string form_config_service e.g. alpha_form_config.registration-form-config @param array request @description - This template will call service to get the field group from form config and render validation attribute for each field. Based on that it will find the value from request.{field.name} and check the validation using the module "validation" present in this service **// [templates.add process]
[if.not_empty template.form_config_service] [service.run {template.form_config_service} set="module.form-config" /] [/if.not_empty]
[if.not_empty template.form-config] [template.get form-config set="module.form-config" /] [/if.not_empty]
[module.set error_fields="" /]
[loop.@grp module.form-config.groups] [loop.@fields @grp.item.field] [if.not_empty @fields.item.validation] [template.set current_field="" /] [loop.@eachRule @fields.item.validation.comma] [aw2.get request.{@fields.key} set="template.value" /] [service.run aw_form.validation.{@eachRule.item} field="{@fields.key}" label="{@fields.item.label}" value="{template.value}" set="template.result" /] [if.equal rhs="{template.result.status}" lhs="error"] [module.set_array error_fields.new field="{@fields.key}" label="{@fields.item.label}" reason="{template.result.reason}" empty="{template.current_field}" /] [template.set current_field="{@fields.key}" /] [/if.equal] [/loop.@eachRule] [/if.not_empty] [/loop.@fields] [/loop.@grp]
[module.set js="" /]
[if.not_empty module.error_fields] [module.set js] <script type="spa/axn" axn="core.run_script"> [loop.@eachField module.error_fields] $('[request.get bind_selector /] .form-group.[aw2.get @eachField.item.field /]').addClass('has-error'); $('[request.get bind_selector /] .form-group.[aw2.get @eachField.item.field /] .help-block').text('[aw2.get @eachField.item.reason /]'); [/loop.@eachField]
$('html, body').animate({scrollTop: $('[request.get bind_selector /] .form-group.has-error:first').offset().top}, 1000); $('[request.get bind_selector /] .form-group.has-error:first .form-control').focus(); </script> [/module.set] [/if.not_empty]
[if.equal lhs="{template.return_type}" rhs="array"] [template.return module.error_fields /] [/if.equal]
[template.return module.js /] [/templates.add]

item.title: meta
meta_query
item.content:encoded:
//** Vikas Build support for seek to make queries even faster **//
//** input module.query output module.dataset **// [templates.add main] [aw2.get dataset_values pageno="{module.query.pageno}" pagesize="{module.query.pagesize}" offset="{module.query.offset}" set="module.dataset" /]
//** set Limit **// [module.set dataset.limit_string] LIMIT [module.dataset.pagesize /] [/module.set]
//** set Offset **//
[module.set dataset.offset_string] OFFSET [module.dataset.offset /] [/module.set]
[if.equal lhs='{module.dataset.pagesize}' rhs='-1'] [module.set dataset.limit_string='' /] [module.set dataset.offset_string='' /] [/if.equal]
//** If With exists in the query, Create With **// [module.set with={module.query.with} /] [templates.q0 set=module.dataset.q0 /]
//** additional Fields **//
[module.set query_counter=0 /] [module.set query_no='q{module.query_counter}' /]
[module.set add_field={module.query.with.add_field} /] [templates.add_field /]
//** Create Filters **//
[module.set filter={module.query.with.filter} /] [templates.filter /]
[do.@junk set=module.dataset.with_query] [module.dataset.q0 /] [if.not_empty module.dataset.field_query] ,[module.get dataset.field_query.comma /] [/if.not_empty] [if.not_empty module.dataset.filter_query] ,[module.get dataset.filter_query.comma /] [/if.not_empty] [/do.@junk]
//** Generate the count if required **// [if.equal lhs='{module.query.query_count}' rhs='yes'] [do.@junk set=module.dataset.count_query] [module.set current_query_no='{module.query_no}' /] [module.set current_query_no={module.query.with.bounded_data.query_no} not_empty='{module.query.with.bounded_data.query_no}'/]
[module.dataset.with_query /], bounded_data as ( SELECT * FROM [module.current_query_no /] [if.not_empty module.query.max_count] LIMIT [module.query.max_count/] [/if.not_empty] ), junk AS (SELECT * FROM bounded_data) select count(1) from bounded_data [/do.@junk] [query.get_var set=module.dataset.found_rows] [module.get dataset.count_query /] [/query.get_var] [aw2.get dataset_values pagesize="{module.dataset.pagesize}" found_rows="{module.dataset.found_rows}" set="module.temp_dataset" /] [module.set dataset.found_pages="{module.temp_dataset.found_pages}" /] [/if.equal]
//** Create Bounded Data **//
[templates.bounded_data set=module.dataset.bounded_query /]
[module.set dataset.junk_query] junk AS (SELECT * FROM bounded_data) [/module.set]
//** Set up transform **//
[do.@junk set=module.dataset.meta_query.new not_empty='{module.query.transform.ref_id}'] [module.set dataset.transform=yes /] select 'data_id' AS type,[module.query.transform.ref_id] AS data_id,'' AS meta_key,'' AS meta_value from bounded_data [/do.@junk]
[do.@junk set=module.dataset.meta_query.new not_empty='{module.query.transpose.ref_id}'] [module.set dataset.transpose=yes /] select 'data_id' AS type,[module.query.transpose.ref_id] AS data_id,'' AS meta_key,'' AS meta_value from bounded_data [/do.@junk]
//** Create the meta query **//
[module.set meta_query={module.query.meta} /] [templates.meta_query /]
[module.set dataset.meta_query.new empty='{module.dataset.meta_query}'] SELECT * FROM bounded_data [/module.set]
//** join the query **//
[do.@junk set=module.dataset.with_query] [module.dataset.with_query /] ,[module.get dataset.bounded_query /] ,[module.get dataset.junk_query /] [/do.@junk] [do.@junk set=module.dataset.query] [module.get dataset.with_query /] [aw2.get module.dataset.meta_query separator=' UNION ' /] [/do.@junk] [module.return module.dataset cond='{module.query.only_query}' equal='yes'/] [query.meta_query dataset='{module.dataset}' set=module.dataset /] [module.return module.dataset /] [/templates.add]
[templates.add set_query_no] [module.set previous_query_no='q{module.query_counter}' /] [math.solve main='{module.query_counter}+1' set=module.query_counter /] [module.set query_no='q{module.query_counter}' /] [/templates.add]
//** templates to add meta query **//
[templates.add meta_query] [loop.@meta_query module.query.meta] [module.set current_meta={@meta_query.item} /] [templates.meta_bounded_field true='{module.current_meta.bounded_field.exists}'/] [templates.meta_series true='{module.current_meta.x.exists}'/] [templates.meta_field true='{module.current_meta.field.exists}'/] [templates.meta_meta_keys true='{module.current_meta.meta_keys.exists}' /] [templates.meta_taxonomy true='{module.current_meta.taxonomy.exists}' /] [templates.meta_sql true='{module.current_meta.sql.exists}' /] [templates.meta_aw2_collection_keys true='{module.current_meta.aw2_collection_keys.exists}' /] [/loop.@meta_query] [/templates.add]
[templates.add meta_series] [do.@junk set=module.dataset.meta_query.new] select [templates.meta_x_format /] as x [if.not_empty module.current_meta.series.field] ,[module.current_meta.series.field /] as series [/if.not_empty] , [module.current_meta.series_data.agg default="count"/]([module.current_meta.series_data.field/]) as series_data from bounded_data group by [templates.meta_x_format /] [if.not_empty module.current_meta.series.field] ,[module.current_meta.series.field /] [/if.not_empty] [/do.@junk] [module.set current_meta='' /] [/templates.add]
[templates.add meta_x_format] [template.return module.current_meta.x.field empty='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}'/]
[template.set x='{module.current_meta.x.field}' /] [template.set x='DATE({template.x})' cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='day' /] [template.set x='DATE({template.x})' cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='days' /] [template.set x='DATE({template.x})' cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='week' /] [template.set x='DATE({template.x})' cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='month' /]
[template.set x="DATE_FORMAT({template.x},'%Y-%u')" cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='weeks' /]
[template.set x="DATE_FORMAT({template.x},'%Y-%m')" cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='months' /] [template.set x="DATE_FORMAT({template.x},'%Y-%m')" cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='quarter' /] [template.set x="DATE_FORMAT({template.x},'%Y-%m')" cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='year' /]
[template.set x="CONCAT(YEAR({template.x}),'-',Quarter({template.x_column}))" cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='quarters' /]
[template.set x='YEAR({template.x})' cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='years' /]
[template.return template.x /] [/templates.add]
[templates.add meta_x_format_backup] [template.return module.current_meta.x.field empty='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}'/]
[template.set x='{module.current_meta.x.field}' /] [template.set x='DATE({template.x})' cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='day' /] [template.set x="DATE_FORMAT({template.x},'%Y-%u')" cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='week' /] [template.set x="DATE_FORMAT({template.x},'%Y-%m')" cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='month' /] [template.set x="CONCAT(YEAR({template.x}),'-',Quarter({template.x_column}))" cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='quarter' /] [template.set x='YEAR({template.x})' cond='{module.current_meta.x.field_format}' equal='year' /] [template.return template.x /] [/templates.add]
[templates.add meta_bounded_field] [module.set current_meta.data_id_field='data_id' empty='{module.current_meta.data_id_field}'/] [do.@junk set=module.dataset.meta_query.new] SELECT 'meta' AS type,bounded_data.[module.current_meta.data_id_field /] ,'[module.current_meta.bounded_field]' as meta_key,[module.current_meta.bounded_field] as meta_value FROM bounded_data [/do.@junk] [module.set current_meta='' /] [/templates.add]
[templates.add meta_field] [module.set current_meta.data_id_field='data_id' empty='{module.current_meta.data_id_field}'/] [module.set current_meta.as_field='{module.current_meta.field}' empty='{module.current_meta.as_field}'/] [module.set current_meta.table='wp_posts' empty='{module.current_meta.table}'/] [module.set current_meta.id_field='ID' empty='{module.current_meta.id_field}'/] [module.set current_meta.ref_id='data_id' empty='{module.current_meta.ref_id}'/]
[do.@junk set=module.dataset.meta_query.new] SELECT 'meta' AS type,bounded_data.[module.current_meta.data_id_field /] ,'[module.current_meta.as_field]' as meta_key,[module.current_meta.field] as meta_value FROM [module.current_meta.table] AS meta JOIN bounded_data ON meta.[module.current_meta.id_field /]=bounded_data.[module.current_meta.ref_id /] [/do.@junk] [module.set current_meta='' /]
[/templates.add]
[templates.add meta_meta_keys] [module.set current_meta.data_id_field='data_id' empty='{module.current_meta.data_id_field}'/] [module.set current_meta.meta_key_field='meta_key' empty='{module.current_meta.meta_key_field}'/] [module.set current_meta.meta_value_field='meta_value' empty='{module.current_meta.meta_value_field}'/] [module.set current_meta.table='wp_postmeta' empty='{module.current_meta.table}'/] [module.set current_meta.id_field='post_id' empty='{module.current_meta.id_field}'/] [module.set current_meta.ref_id='data_id' empty='{module.current_meta.ref_id}'/]
[do.@junk set=module.dataset.meta_query.new] SELECT 'meta' AS type,bounded_data.[module.current_meta.data_id_field /] ,[module.current_meta.meta_key_field] as meta_key,[module.current_meta.meta_value_field] as meta_value FROM [module.current_meta.table] AS meta JOIN bounded_data ON meta.[module.current_meta.id_field /]=bounded_data.[module.current_meta.ref_id /] where [module.current_meta.meta_key_field] in ([module.current_meta.meta_keys.comma.quote_comma /]) [/do.@junk] [module.set current_meta='' /]
[/templates.add]
[templates.add meta_taxonomy] [module.set current_meta.data_id_field='data_id' empty='{module.current_meta.data_id_field}'/] [module.set current_meta.taxonomy_value_field='name' empty='{module.current_meta.taxonomy_value_field}'/] [module.set current_meta.ref_id='data_id' empty='{module.current_meta.ref_id}'/]
[do.@junk set=module.dataset.meta_query.new] SELECT 'meta' AS type,bounded_data.[module.current_meta.data_id_field /] ,taxonomy as meta_key,[module.current_meta.taxonomy_value_field] as meta_value FROM all_terms AS meta JOIN bounded_data ON meta.object_id=bounded_data.[module.current_meta.ref_id /] where taxonomy in ([module.current_meta.taxonomy.comma.quote_comma /]) [/do.@junk] [module.set current_meta='' /] [/templates.add]

[if.equal lhs='{module.current_filter.period}' rhs='year'] [module.set current_filter.which=0 cond='{module.current_filter.which}' equal='this_year'/] [module.set current_filter.which=1 cond='{module.current_filter.which}' equal='this_year'/] YEAR([module.current_filter.field]) = YEAR(CURDATE()) - [module.current_filter.which/] [/if.equal] [/do.@junk]

[/if.not_whitespace] [module.set current_filter='' /] [/templates.add]

item.title: csv
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
item.content:encoded: [debug.ignore] generate header === done remove count if >1 === done sort out the security issue [/debug.ignore] [templates.add main] [module.set table="{search.table}" /] [module.set query="{search.query}" /] [module.set column="{module.table.column}" /] [module.set query.pageno={form_data.pageno} default=1 /] [module.set query.query_count='no'/] [module.set query.query_count='yes' cond="{form_data.pageno}" equal="1" /] [module.set query.pagesize={module.handler.pagesize} not_empty='{module.handler.pagesize}' /] [db.meta_query query="{module.query}" set="module.dataset" /] [session_ticket.get {app.active.ticket} field='csv_found_pages' set=module.csv_found_pages /] [if.empty module.csv_found_pages] [module.set csv_found_pages={module.dataset.found_pages} /] [session_ticket.set {app.active.ticket} field='csv_found_pages' value='{module.csv_found_pages}' /] [aw2.set_array search found_pages='{module.dataset.found_pages}' found_rows='{module.dataset.found_rows}' /] [/if.empty] [module.set csv_array="" /] //**check if pageno=1 then loop through columns and create 1 row.**// [loop.@column module.column cond="{form_data.pageno}" equal="1"] [aw2.get @column.item.label set=module.temp_col_array.new /] [/loop.@column] [module.set csv_array.new="{module.temp_col_array}" /] [loop.@rows module.dataset.rows] [do.row] [loop.@i @rows.item] [aw2.get @i.item set=row.{@i.key} /] [/loop.@i] [module.set temp_col_array="" /] [loop.@columns module.column] [aw2.get @rows.item.{@columns.item.meta_key} set=module.temp_col_array.new not_empty='{@columns.item.meta_key}'/] [code.run @columns.item.calc set=module.temp_col_array.new not_empty='{@columns.item.calc}'/] [/loop.@columns] [module.set csv_array.new="{module.temp_col_array}" /] [/do.row] [/loop.@rows] [session_ticket.get {app.active.ticket} field='csv_ticket' set=module.csv_ticket /] [if.empty module.csv_ticket] [module.set csv_ticket={token} /] [session_ticket.set {app.active.ticket} field='csv_ticket' value='{module.csv_ticket}' /] [/if.empty] [util.save_csv_page pageno="{form_data.pageno}" rows="{module.csv_array}" key="{module.csv_ticket}" /] [/templates.add]

item.title: widget-submit
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] [do.search] [module.set args={module.json_args.json_decode} /] [module.args merge_with=search /] [module.args set=search.args /] [do.form_data] [module.set form_data={module.json_search_form_data.json_decode} /] [module.form_data merge_with=form_data /] [util.form_data_array merge_with=form_data /] //** Handle after submit to prevent earlier parsing**// [arr.create merge_with=search] //** This do is an array do **// [do] [aw2.get search.after_submit /] [/do] [/arr.create] [do.widget] [module.set widget={module.json_widget.json_decode} /] [module.widget merge_with=widget /] [templates.run {widget.widget_type} /] [/do.widget] [/do.form_data] [/do.search] [/templates.add] //** table_chart is used to set header title, graph and table section wise **// [templates.add table_chart] //**run widget code, set widget_data in the env and merge with global query**// [code.run widget.code c.exists="widget.code"/] //**setup period in query if default_period is set and form_data.select_period is empty**// [if.not_empty widget.default_period] [env.set_array period_filter.new field="object_date" period="{widget.default_period}" c.empty='env.form_data.select_period' /] [env.period_filter merge_with=search.query.with.filter c.empty='env.form_data.select_period'/] [/if.not_empty] //**Check if x field_type is date, if yes, add field_format**// [if.equal lhs="{widget_data.query.meta.0.x.field_type}" rhs="date"] [env.get form_data.select_period m.explode_on="s::" o.set="template.field_format" /] [if.empty template.field_format] [env.get widget.default_period m.explode_on="s::" o.set="template.field_format" /] [/if.empty] [env.set widget_data.query.meta.0.x.field_format="{template.field_format.0}" /] [/if.equal] //**merge widget query data with search **// [env.widget_data.query.with merge_with=search.query.with /] [env.widget_data.query.meta merge_with=search.query.meta /] //**Fire the query and get back the dataset**// [db.meta_query query='{search.query}' o.set=widget_data.result.dataset /] //** Chart service is used to generate pie chart for the provided data **// [chart_service.run {widget.chart_type} query_result={widget_data.result.dataset.rows} set=template.graph /] //**Setup table data**// [loop.@widget_meta widget_data.query.meta.0] [template.set_array args.column.new label="{@widget_meta.item.label}" meta_key="{@widget_meta.key}" /] [/loop.@widget_meta] [loop.@widget_meta widget_data.query.table_column.0] [template.set_array args.column.new label="{@widget_meta.item.label}" meta_key="{@widget_meta.key}" /] [/loop.@widget_meta] //** UI service is used to generate table for provided data **// [ui.table args='{template.args}' dataset='{widget_data.result.dataset}' set=template.htmltable /] [template.set html]

Total : [env.get widget_data.result.dataset.found_rows /]

[templates.options id={template.id} period_filter="{widget.period_filter default=no}" /]
[if.not_empty template.graph]
[template.get htmltable /]
[template.get graph /]
[/if.not_empty] [if.else]
No Data Available
[/if.else]
[/template.set]
[form_control.section id="{token}" html="{template.html}" title="{widget.title}"/]
[/templates.add] //**Widget type HTML**// [templates.add html]
[form_control.section id="{token}" html="{widget.html}" title="{widget.title}"/]
[/templates.add] //** Nav template contains period menus **// [templates.add options]
[if.equal lhs="{template.period_filter}" rhs="yes"] [if.not_empty env.form_data.select_period] [template.set period_value='{env.form_data.select_period}' /] [/if.not_empty] [if.else] [template.set period_value='{widget.default_period}' /] [/if.else]
[form_control.select_period id='select_period' value="{template.period_value}" /]
[/if.equal] [/templates.add]

item.title: blocks
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
item.content:encoded:
//**Personal Details action: display_form display edit (conditional) edit_form edit add_form new add form **// [templates.add editable_personal_details] [env.set_array single_data.blocks.new] [atts label = "Personal Details" lapp_id={single_data.lapp_id} meta_data={single_data.lapp_meta} /] [action]display_form[/action] [edit_service action="common_service.lapp.get_edit_data"/] [update_service action="common_service.lapp.update_edit_data"/] [field personal_email label="Personal Email Id" edit="yes" data_type="text"/] [field full_name label="Full Name" edit="yes" data_type="text"/] [field fathers_name label="Father's name" edit="yes" data_type="text" /] [field mothers_maiden_name label="Mother's maiden name" edit="yes" data_type="text"/] [field dob label="Date of birth" edit="yes" data_type="date"/] [field job_type label="Job type" edit="yes" data_type="select" taxonomy="job_type"/] [field mobile_number label="Mobile no." edit="yes" data_type="number"/] [field educational_qualification label="Education qualication" edit="yes" data_type="select" taxonomy="educational_qualification"/] [field gender label="Gender" edit="yes" data_type="select" data_type="select" taxonomy="gender"/] [field marital_status label="Marital Status" edit="yes" data_type="select" taxonomy="marital_status" /] [field no_of_dependents label="No of dependents" edit="yes" data_type="text"/] [field employment_year label="Years of employement" edit="yes" data_type="select" taxonomy="employment_year"/] [/env.set_array] [/templates.add]//***single page wrapper***// [templates.add main] //******display form label and values in horizontal manner*****// [module.set_array args form_type="horizontal" bs3_label_class="col-md-4 text-right" bs3_control_class="col-md-8"/] //****loop through all the blocks****// [loop.@block single_data.blocks set=template.html] [env.get @block.item o.set=single_data.block /] [templates.render_block /] [/loop.@block] //*******render page******// [ui.outer-block title={template.header} html={template.html}/] [/templates.add] //*****render single block*****// [templates.add render_block] //****store action in variable at template level, default is: display_form*****// [env.get single_data.block.action set=template.action default="display_form"/] //*****get unique_id for each block*****// [template.set unique_id = "section_{unique_number}"/] //****set empty html***// [template.set html=''/] //*****when action is html******// [if.empty template.html] [env.get single_data.block.html set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.html"/] [/if.empty] //*****when action is custom* [if.empty template.html] [templates.display_form c.cond="template.action" c.eq="s:display_form"/] [/if.empty] *****// //*****when custom_service is available******// [if.empty template.html] [templates.custom_loader set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.custom_service.action"/] //****[service.run {single_data.block.custom_service.action} set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.custom_service.action"/]***// [/if.empty] //*****when action is add_form******// [if.empty template.html] [templates.add_form set=template.html c.cond="template.action" c.eq="s:add_form"/] [/if.empty] //*****when action is edit_form******// [if.empty template.html] [templates.edit_form set=template.html c.cond="template.action" c.eq="s:edit_form"/] [/if.empty] //*****when action is display_form******// [if.empty template.html] [templates.display_form set=template.html c.cond="template.action" c.eq="s:display_form"/] [/if.empty] //*******render section block section*****// [form_control.section id={template.unique_id} html={template.html} title={single_data.block.label} open={single_data.block.open}/] [/templates.add] //****when action is add_form****// [templates.add add_form] //*****if fields are not empty, loop through all the fields******// [loop.@field single_data.block.field set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.field"] [this_collection.field.edit/] [/loop.@field] //******generating form name******// [template.set form_name="add-form-{unique_number}"/] //****section field html*****//
//*****render fields******// [template.html/] //*****if edit is not empty, show edit button****// [content.run c.not_empty="single_data.block.add_service.action"] //*****generate tickets****// [this_collection.ticket.generate tpl='add_meta' set=template.ticket/] //****generating add_btn for current form****// [this_collection.field.add_btn ticket={template.ticket} form_name={template.form_name}/] [/content.run]
[/templates.add] //****when action is edit_form****// [templates.add edit_form] //*****if fields are not empty, loop through all the fields******// [loop.@field single_data.block.field set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.field"] [this_collection.field.edit/] [/loop.@field] //****section field html*****//
//******generating form name******// [template.set form_name="edit-form-{unique_number}"/]
//***render form fields***// [template.html/] //*****if edit is not empty, show edit button****// [content.run c.not_empty="single_data.block.edit_service.action"] //*****generate tickets****// [this_collection.ticket.generate tpl='update_meta' set=template.ticket/] //****generating edit_btn for current form****// [this_collection.field.edit_btn ticket={template.ticket} form_name={template.form_name}/] [/content.run]
[/templates.add] //****when action is display_form****// [templates.add display_form] //*****if fields are not empty, loop through all the fields******// [loop.@field single_data.block.field set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.field"] [this_collection.field.display/] [/loop.@field] //****section field html*****//
[template.html/]
//*****if edit is not empty, show edit button****// [content.run c.not_empty="single_data.block.edit_service.action" cond='{single_data.block.editable}' not_equal='false'] //*****generate tickets****// [this_collection.ticket.generate tpl='edit_block' set=template.ticket/] //****generate edit button****//
[/content.run]
//*****edit area*****//
[/templates.add] //***loads custom service***// [templates.add custom_loader] //****set passed collection in a variable****// [template.set coll = {single_data.block.custom_service.action.dot}/] //**run module**// [module.run {template.coll.1} template={template.coll.2} post_type={template.coll.0}/] [/templates.add]

item.content:encoded:
[loop.@a apps] [aw2.set template.app='{@a.item.path}/' /] [template.get app set='template.apps.{@a.key}' /] [/loop.@a] [this_collection.backend-js /] [this_collection.backend-css /]
[if.not_empty settings.backend-logo] [/if.not_empty] [if.else] [wp.get option.blogname /] [/if.else]
[this_collection.side-bar-menu menu='{module.menu}'/]
[app.run active_module /]
[if.not_empty app.page_title] [/if.not_empty]

item.title: side-bar-menu
item.dc:creator: praveen
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] //**Template Menus of array**// [core.backend-menu o.set="template.menus" c.empty='{module.menu}'/] [module.menu o.set="template.menus" c.not_empty='{module.menu}'/]
//**Search bar**//
//**Search output container**//
    [loop.@menu template.menus] [if.user_can_access link='{@menu.item.link}' o.set='template.user_allowed'/] [if.true template.user_allowed]
  • [if.not_empty @menu.item.icon] [/if.not_empty] [aw2.get @menu.item.title /] [if.not_empty @menu.item.child-nav]
      [loop.@submenu @menu.item.child-nav] [if.user_can_access link='{@submenu.item.link}' o.set='template.user_allowed'/] [do.@x c.true=template.user_allowed]
    • [aw2.get @submenu.item.title /]
      • [/do.@x] [/loop.@submenu]
    [/if.not_empty]
    • [/if.true] [/loop.@menu]
[/templates.add]
